title: Electronic Data Processing Specialist
issuer: Department of Communications and Information Technology
description: Certified in electronic data processing and information management systems.

title: Philippine Air Force Reservist
description: Trained and certified as a reservist in the Philippine Air Force, demonstrating commitment to national service and discipline.

title: Quick Response Team (QRT) Lead
issuer: Department of Social Welfare and Development
description: Appointed as QRT Lead under DSWD Special Order No. 2434, series of 2025. Recognized for leadership and coordination in rapid response operations.

title: Designated Safety and Evacuation Officer (SEO)
issuer: Department of Social Welfare and Development
description: Provided safety and evacuation training to staff, ensuring preparedness for emergencies in the workplace.

title: Certified Six Sigma Yellow Belt
description: Professional certification in foundational Six Sigma principles for process improvement.

title: Civil Service Eligibility - Professional Level
description: Passed the Civil Service Examination for Professional Level, demonstrating knowledge in public administration and governance.

title: DSWD Contingency Plan for Earthquake (Office Focal)
issuer: Department of Social Welfare and Development
description: Trained and oriented by the DSWD Buildings and Grounds Management Office (BGMD) to act as the designated office implementer and focal person for earthquake contingency plans.

title: Compliance Officer for Data Privacy
issuer: Department of Social Welfare and Development
description: Designated as the Compliance Officer for Data Privacy, ensuring adherence to data protection policies, safeguarding sensitive information, and maintaining compliance with relevant laws and regulations.
